attributes.action: Ban the sell of fireworks to the public. Only sell to events for bonfire night
attributes.additional_details: Banning the sell/use of fireworks will allow more animals to live free from worry and stress over multiple nights a year. 'hope' the baby zebra died from stress from fireworks and wasn't even 1 year of age. People with PTSD will suffer. They start too early and go on to late. They should only be available for bonfire night and New year's eve, AND NOT to the public.
attributes.background: Ban the sell and use of fireworks to the public as too many wildlife/animals/people are either loosing their life from stress or it's causing more harm than good. Only make them available on bonfire night/new year's eve to places hosting an event.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891 

You may also like to sign the following petitions which call for related actions:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758 

Ban the use of fireworks during the Covid-19 lockdown period: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316753 

Ban all firework sales except the days of November 5th And January 31st: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555746 

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448 

Require 1 week's notice be given of any use of fireworks in a residential area: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332906 

Ban the release of fireworks after 10pm, including on bonfire night: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557153 

Make it illegal for fireworks to be set off on days other than Nov 5 and Dec 31:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559397
